Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Christopher Schweitzer
Dear Sir,
Christopher Schweitzer has an ERA of 6.20 at AA San Ramon Beavers.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of James Goodloe
Dear Sir,
James Goodloe shouldn't play at AA San Ramon Beavers!
He has an AVG of .170 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Arthur Blankinship
Dear Sir,
Arthur Blankinship isn't hitting the ball at all at AA San Ramon Beavers!
He has an AVG of .192, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1984
Subject: Chad Romig is sick...
Diagnosis: Viral Infection.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 5/11/1984
Subject: Status of Richard Keller
Dear Sir,
Richard Keller has problems at AA San Ramon Beavers!
He has an ERA of 6.95, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1984
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Cleo Rael



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1984
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Gregory Mcbee
